title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.11 - Unprovided-for movement of freight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.11 - Unprovided-for movement of freight

State Regulations

Shippers must furnish the commission with a copy of steamship
company's confirmation of space reservation to cover shipments for water
movement. When shippers, consignees, rail or water carriers forward merchandise
or commodities to be handled over the Port facilities without having previously
made arrangement for the handling or storage of same, it is optional with the
commission management as to whether such business shall be accepted or not, and
the commission will not be responsible for any rail or steamship demurrage
which may accrue under these circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

800.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
